name: Out Of Guntrol (Coborax)
description:
This is a game made in 48 hours, for the GMTK Jam by Mikkel L. Mouridsen (@Coborax4K)

The game is a top-down bullet hell shooter game, where your gun randomly changes configuration.

Controls
WASD - Movement
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Dash

Tools used
Godot [Engine], Aseprite [Art], BFXR [SFX], Bosca Soil [Music]
